entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 40%
